alert.note: Alert for Lower Yukon Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 24 at 11:24AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING FOR AN ICE JAM NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by an ice jam continues. * WHERE...Yukon River at Russian Mission. * WHEN...Until noon AKDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...High water in Russian Mission is flooding the runway and it is unusable at this time. Water is flooding some homes with other homes and structures surrounded by water, water is overtopping roads, and the lower part of town has been evacuated to higher ground. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11 AM AKDT Wednesday, an ice jam remains in place on Yukon River below Russian Mission. Water continues to back up and flood Russian Mission. Water levels will continue to fluctuate until the ice jam releases. - A large surge of water and ice is currently moving down the Yukon River from ice jams that have released upriver near Ruby. Residents should be prepared for a long period of high water even after the ice jam releases. - http://weather.gov/aprfc - If you live near or along the Yukon River at Russian Mission stay alert and be prepared to take action.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
